Cake

MVP Sweets specializes in Dominican cakes which are the perfect blend of taste and moisture. All cakes and ornaments are always fresh and made from scratch. Our cakes feature the following ingridients:

  • Guava filling
  • Pineapple filling
  • Cream filling
  • Dulce de leche filling
  • Tres leche
  • Fondant
  • Meringue frosting (Suspiro)

We don't stop at traditional cakes, we also make:

  • Cupcakes
  • Cakepops
  • Specialized cookies
  • Edible decoration

If you none of these things make you feel warm and fuzzy inside, let us know. We are all about putting a smile on our clients' face.


Decoration

A great cake is a party but decoration makes for celebration! At MVP Sweets, we specialize in being a one-stop-shop for your festivities. We know the value of presentation and with that in mind, we tailor beautiful decoration with your extradionary cake.


Portfolio

Contact

MVP Sweets is located in The Bronx, NY. I mainly service the Tri-State area with my clients picking up their orders.
